idea title: Integrated source-level information loaded from DWARF or PDB into debug commands and print p commands
idea description:
Support for missing architectures that are supported by Rizin statically in the Linux native debugger
Support for missing architectures that are supported by Rizin statically in the BSD native debugger
Cover more platforms supported by the debugger with automated tests, with CI whenever it’s possible
Fix the bugs in debuggers, minor refactorings of the code
skills:
Good knowledge of the C language
Some experience in debugging with GDB or LLDB

idea description:
Create the basic plugin that allows attaching, spawning, launching processes within Frida locally
Support remote connection
Add feature to receive information from the Frida instance
Add breakpoints and run/step/continue features
Support calling functions and scripts in the context of the instrumented process
skills: Participant should know C as well as have experience of working with debuggers

idea description:
Rewrite C++ demangler and remove the GPL code
Rewrite some of the mainstream architectures that still rely on binutils without using GPL-only code
skills: Participant should know C and basics of C++ for understanding the mangling scheme

idea description:
Update the shellcodes database, improve rz-gg features and documentation
Implement a ropchain syntax parser that uses rz-gg or a custom DSL
Write a compiler which uses SMT solver to produce the ropchain
Support main architectures - x86, ARM, MIPS, PowerPC
skills:
Participant should be comfortable with the C language, know some assembly and a high-level language
Knowing a little bit of automatic binary analysis wouldn’t hurt

idea description: Implementing small issues and missing features to improve user experience significantly
Implementing support for any new file format
Implementing support for any new architecture
Fixing caveats and issues in the current code analysis
Improving support for heap exploration and analysis
Managing and using information about classes in the binary

idea title: Devirtualize method calls using class vtables
idea description: Finding the actual address of the called method
Substituting rz_core_cmd calls with direct API calls
Improving Rizin's readline-compatible implementation in the embedded shell
Solving issues and improving parallel execution and performance
Fixing issues in the decompiler output
